item.title: GM
item.description: score:62 Chances: General Motors Company (GM) has seen a 14% increase in share price, indicating positive movement in the market. The company is engaged in designing, manufacturing, and selling various automobile products, along with software-enabled services and subscriptions, which provides a diverse revenue stream.

item.title: KVUE
item.description: score:-39 Chances: Kenvue Inc. stock saw a 1.4% increase at the end of the after-hours trading session on December 13.The company reported a total dividend expense of $383 million from January to September. The favorable court ruling in a product-liability case resulted in a nearly 5% rise in Kenvue shares.
